name: Celestial Tear Experience
description:
The Celestial Tear Experience (CTX) is an interactive app that contains lore, art, and games from a cosmic fantasy expanded universe. The CTX contains short stories, character profiles, bestiary, music, locations, and games that cover an ever-expanding universe encompassing many points in time in the Celestial Tear. Step into an immersive reality where heroes, dragons, and rogues must battle against cosmic abominations for the fate of reality. 

Requires a working internet connection!

Updated Weekly with New Content! Lore

Discover the many heroes and legends of the Celestial Tear in the digital encyclopedia! Trinkets, items, monsters, and mythical locations of all kinds will be added monthly to this ever-growing database. 

Cosmic Fantasy Universe

Read amazing stories from western to cosmic fantasy, stories that take place at many points within the Celestial Tear timeline. Captivating short stories and comics full of adventure and mystery capture the birth and destruction of a conflicted reality.   

Games

Play demos and follow the development of our games as we collide comics and games in the Celestial Tear. Our stories and comics expand with our games that offer a more engaging experience with our characters and world.

We hope you support and join our developing universe and immerse yourself in some new and original stories as we continue to build this experience.

Requires a working internet connection!
